name: PM Intelligence A2A Server
description: PM Intelligence Context Layer A2A interface for external agents

skills.name: Customer Profile Query
skills.description: Returns comprehensive customer profile: health score, features used, active issues, recent signals, stakeholders, and trends.

skills.name: Issue Heatmap
skills.description: Returns severity-weighted heatmap of issues by customer, feature area, or product. Supports time-window filtering.

skills.name: Trend Analysis
skills.description: Returns emerging, growing, stable, and declining trends for issues, features, or customers over a configurable time window.

skills.name: Opportunity Priorities
skills.description: Returns prioritized opportunities with scoring, customer impact, and provenance chains.

skills.name: Report Generation
skills.description: Generates shareable reports: customer health summary, weekly digest, roadmap summary, competitive intel.

skills.name: Signal Ingestion
skills.description: Ingest a new signal through the full pipeline: normalization, extraction, entity resolution, graph sync.

skills.name: Entity Change Proposal
skills.description: Propose an entity merge, split, or cleanup for human approval.

skills.name: Provenance Chain
skills.description: Trace an insight back to its source signals and extractions.

skills.name: Knowledge Query
skills.description: Answer a natural language question with supporting signals and confidence.
